content:
Details:
How do you link location, healthcare service and availability?
http://hl7.org/fhir/2018Jan/practitionerrole.html
location, healthcareService and the availability attributes are all 0..*. How do you indicate which in a list of multiples goes with which? For instance, I expect a practitioner might be availabe at one location and not available at others.
Submitted by @Julia Skapik
My initial thought about this is that the schedule represents the availability. Or if not, or that s too much for some systems, isn't it the healthcare service that connects them all?
If a location has specific availability differences for a healthcare service, then it will have a separate healthcare service resource instance created with those details.
